title: The boldest bitcoin predictions for 2026 are in — from $75,000 to $225,000
summary: Industry executives and investors forecast a wide range of prices for bitcoin in 2026, dropping as low as $75,000 and rising as high as $225,000.

title: Big copper shortage to pose ‘systemic risk’ to global economies, warns S&P
summary: Data group forecasts deficit of 10mn tonnes by 2040, equivalent to nearly one-third of current global demand
